reviewText: A must have for any Local H fan. One of the best bands around and they are the best two man band ever.
This show rocks, and rocks, and never stops. The title is very fitting. It's a very angry set and it will leave you wanting more

When i bought this i thought it only had the performance of 12 angry months. Turns out it also the performance of here comes the zoo and also clips from a few other shows. definitely worth it if you're a local h fan.
If you have ever seen Local H, this video pales in comparison to the live performance in person. That said, it is fun snapshot from that tour and definitely worth a look.
